Description.Text:
Geographically located in the direct center of the San Fernando Valley, the world famous Airtel Plaza Hotel is recognized for its extraordinary level of service and friendliness. Attractions such as the Getty Center, Universal Studios, Griffith Observatory, Hollywood, Downtown Los Angeles, Staples Center, Santa Monica, and Beverly Hills all within minutes' drive from the hotel. Located on the Van Nuys Airport and highlighted in the famous documentary “One Six Right”, guests can enjoy the thrill of watching private jets owned by business executives, Hollywood celebrities and politicians taxi in and out right outside of your window. With the “CHAIN OF ONE” approach, the Airtel Plaza will always make the best efforts to quickly and pleasantly respond to any guests requests. So, come stay and enjoy the best independent hotel you've experienced!
Facility Includes : - Self-Parking is $10 (fee subject to change) - Complimentary shuttle service to & from Van Nuys bus station/LAX Airport - Complimentary Wireless Internet Access - Complimentary local calls - Coffee/Tea Maker - Iron/Ironing board - Hairdryer - Data Ports and Voicemail - Separate Vanity - TV with In-room movies by LodgeNet - Complimentary Fitness Center - Complimentary Coffee (Mon-Fri. 4am - 6am in the lobby) - Outdoor Pool/Jacuzzi - Business Center - Landings Restaurant - Touch and Go Cafe - Clipper Club Lounge - Gift Shop
- 100% Non-Smoking Hotel - Upon arrival, guests will be required to provide a valid credit card or nightly deposit to secure any incidental charges.
